Package index

All functions

chunk_las_catalog()
Tile raw .las|.laz files to work with smaller chunks
cloud2raster()
Use raw .las|.laz files to generate CHM, DTM, and Normalized .las files
cloud2trees()
Use raw .las|.laz files to generate CHM, DTM, and a tree list
cloud2trees_to_lanl_trees()
Use outputs from cloud2trees() to generate inputs for LANL TREES program
create_lax_for_tiles()
Create spatial index .lax files
find_ext_data()
Find the location of external data
get_data()
Download all external data used by package
get_foresttype()
Download Forest Type Groups of the Continental United States data
get_landfire()
Download Forest Type Groups of the Continental United States data
get_treemap()
Download TreeMap 2016 data
itd_tuning()
Individual Tree Detection (ITD) tuning
itd_ws_functions()
Individual Tree Detection (ITD) functions
ladderfuelsr_cbh()
estimate CBH for a single tree using LadderFuelsR package
leafr_for_ladderfuelsr()
re-writes leafR steps to allow for treeID as input for ladderfuelsR or ladderfuelsr_cbh()
polygon_attribute_to_las()
function to attach polygon attribute to point cloud
raster2trees()
Use a CHM raster to detect individual trees
simplify_multipolygon_crowns()
Simplify MULTIPOLYGON to POLYGON geometry in an sf class object
treels_stem_dbh()
detect tree stems and estimate DBH using TreeLS package
trees_biomass()
Estimate tree biomass (or crown biomass) for a tree list
trees_biomass_cruz()
Estimate tree crown biomass for a tree list based on Cruz et al. (2003)
trees_biomass_landfire()
Estimate tree crown biomass for a tree list using LANDFIRE data
trees_cbh()
Estimate CBH using tree crown polygons and normalized point cloud data
trees_competition()
Calculate competition metrics for a tree list
trees_dbh()
Estimate DBH for a tree list based on height
trees_hmd()
Estimate HMD using tree crown polygons and normalized point cloud data
trees_landfire_cbd()
Extract LANDFIRE CBD raster cell value for a tree list based on location
trees_type()
Estimate forest type for a tree list based on location

Developed by George Woolsey.

Site built with pkgdown 2.2.0.
